EmailTemplate.description: This template is used by CAS team members when they are unable to contact injured person
EmailTemplate.name: UnableToContactCustomer
EmailTemplate.subject: REF NO. {!Case.CaseNumber} Motor accident injury insurer details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for completing the online form as provided on the State Insurance Regulatory Authority (SIRA) website. I am writing from the Claims Advisory Service (CAS) regarding your recent request to find out who to claim compensation with for your motor accident injury.
We tried calling you on {!Contact.Phone} but we've been unsuccessful.
Can you please call us back on 1300 656 919, 8:30am to 5pm, Monday to Friday to discuss your request.
Please do not reply on this email, if you have any enquiries please send your email to motor@sira.nsw.gov.au
Your reference number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Kind regards, Claims Advisory Service State Insurance Regulatory Authority p 1300 656 919 www.sira.nsw.gov.au
